title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, the perfect addition to your holiday decor! This set includes a beautiful wreath with a diameter of 23.6 inches and a garland with a length of 8.8 feet. 

The wreath and garland are adorned with a variety of festive components, including snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. These elements create a stunning and realistic look that will impress your guests.

The set also features 100 LED warm lights, adding a warm and cozy glow to your decorations. The lights are battery-operated, requiring 3 AA batteries (not included). With a timer function of 6 hours on and 18 hours off, you can easily control the lighting to suit your preferences and conserve battery life.

We take pride in the quality of our products, and this wreath and garland set is no exception. Made from sturdy high-quality materials, it is built to last. The materials used are hypoallergenic and include fireproof pins for added safety.

One of the best features of this set is its durability. You can enjoy the beauty of these decorations without worrying about maintenance. They require no water and will never fade, ensuring that they will look stunning throughout the holiday season and beyond.

Whether you want to decorate your indoor or outdoor space, this wreath and garland set is suitable for both. It can be placed on walls, doors, fireplaces, in the living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows, allowing you to create a festive ambiance wherever you desire.

For your peace of mind, we offer a warranty period of 365 days, and our customer service is available 24 hours a day. We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction with our product.

Don't miss out on this Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order now and make your holiday season merry and bright!
